obtained from HM Revenue & Customs under s1033 CTA 2010.
The first 2 tranches took place during the year. In total, 1,052 "A" shares were purchased for £917,247.94 and subsequently
cancelled.
The next tranche took place after the year end when a further 1,050 "A" shares were purchased for £915,504.12. These shares
have also been cancelled.
